item.title: Unfreezing Orange
item.description: Have you ever tried Orange with data big enough that some widgets ran for more than a second? Then you have seen it: Orange froze. While the widget was processing, the interface would not respond to any inputs, and there was no way to stop that widget. Not all the widgets freeze, though! Some widgets, like Test & Score, k-Means, or Image Embedding, do not block. While they are working, we are free to build other parts of the workflow, and these widgets also show their progress.

item.title: GSoC Review: Visualizations with Qt
item.description: During the course of this summer, I created a new plotting library for Orange plot, replacing the use of PyQwt.
